about_the_game:
This music was written throughout the course of developing my hand-illustrated game The Collage Atlas.

'To Climb To Fall From Trees', 'Storm After Storm...', and 'Entirely Without Doubt' are featured in the game.

'Lie In Flowers, Fall Into Clouds' is based on a guitar refrain found in the game.

'Faster Than Trains' was featured in the original public demos, but ultimately was cut from the final game.
credits

Written, Recorded, Performed, & Cover illustration by John William Evelyn
detailed_description:
This music was written throughout the course of developing my hand-illustrated game The Collage Atlas.

'To Climb To Fall From Trees', 'Storm After Storm...', and 'Entirely Without Doubt' are featured in the game.

'Lie In Flowers, Fall Into Clouds' is based on a guitar refrain found in the game.

'Faster Than Trains' was featured in the original public demos, but ultimately was cut from the final game.
credits

Written, Recorded, Performed, & Cover illustration by John William Evelyn
name: The Collage Atlas Soundtrack
